item.name: Improve the procedure 'findPothole'
hint.auto.ReturnRatherThanEnd: Use 'return' rather than 'end' or Robo will not continue with the next procedure!
hint.auto.tryAgain: Robo moves like he is blindfolded. He stopped here, because otherwise you may be waiting for a very long time. However, he should certainly be able to solve this problem. Try again and/or adjust your program to see if it works this time ...
